_comment: VEA configuration - fill in your API keys below

paths._videos_dir_comment: Directory where source videos are stored
paths._indexing_dir_comment: Directory where video indexing metadata is stored
paths._outputs_dir_comment: Directory where generated videos are saved

api_keys._elevenlabs_comment: Get your API key from https://elevenlabs.io/
api_keys._soundstripe_comment: Get your API key from https://www.soundstripe.com/ (optional - for background music)
api_keys._google_project_comment: Your Google Cloud Project ID for Vertex AI (required for Gemini LLM)
api_keys._google_location_comment: Google Cloud region for Vertex AI (default: us-central1)
api_keys._google_auth_required: IMPORTANT: Run 'gcloud auth application-default login' before using

optional_features._enable_dynamic_cropping_comment: Enable AI-powered dynamic cropping with ViNet
optional_features._enable_fcpxml_export_comment: Export Final Cut Pro XML alongside videos

video_processing._comment: Video preprocessing settings for LLM optimization
